channel.title: How do i make my server available to other players?
channel.description: hey guys i need some help on allowing others playing on my server.. like registering or something? please help ty

item.title: How do i make my server available to other players?
item.dc:creator: @wg1 wg
item.description:
@wg1 wrote:

i have same problem-
im using BT Home Hub and i port forwarded like 5 times…
ma server would go on like for 30 minz then crash and then go back up for 30 minz the next day!
wha do i do?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my server available to other players?
item.dc:creator: @desiprince desiprince
item.description:
@desiprince wrote:

turn ur server on and then get a no-ip if u want it then go to the server status page and fill in then u will have it

item.title: How do i make my server available to other players?
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

  1. register ur server on the serverstatus page: www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
  2. MAKE SURE ITS ONLINE…
  3. then people will go to ur server if they like it
